pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Document Printer![GitHub Workflow Status](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/wenkokke/py-doc-printer/CI) ![GitHub tag (latest by date)](https://img.shields.io/github/v/tag/wenkokke/py-doc-printer) ![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/doc-printer)A Wadler-Leijen Pretty Printer in Python.See the [documentation](https://wenkokke.github.io/py-doc-printer/).
